name: Don't Mess With Nonna
description:
Don't Mess With Nonna is a 3D 3rd person action game. Your Nonna has contacted you to help her with some errands. She needs you to go take out some business owners downtown that haven't paid her. She is the Matriarch of the Stroganoff Family after all and you have to listen to her.

Move your player around, with WASD, the area hitting the owners with your Nonna's spoon before time runs out. Use the cross hairs to know where your spoon is pointing. If you happen to see your Nonna's meatballs be sure to get them for speed boost.

Random number of owners and meatballs each time you play!
Fancy textures that look super real!
